it.polimi.se2018.model.card

Class ToolCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.card.ToolCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ToolCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Base class for tool card. Card id starts form 0 instead of 1.
    Author:
    Matteo Formentin
    See Also:

      • setCheck

        public void setCheck(boolean checkDrawDice,
                     boolean checkSomeDiceInHand)
        method for check the state of the player in relation to the dice that he has drawn checkDrawDice && checkSomeDiceInHand care if he has drawn a die and he should have ones in his hand (After draw a die) checkDrawDice && !checkSomeDiceInHand care if he has drawn a die and he shouldn't have ones in his hand (Before draw a die) !checkDrawDice && checkSomeDiceInHand don't care about either of them !checkDrawDice && !checkSomeDiceInHand don't care if he has drawn a die, but he shouldn't have ones in his hand (Normal tool card, with no dice in hand)
        Parameters:
        checkDrawDice - if i care that the player make this move
        checkSomeDiceInHand - if checkSomeDiceInHand is true the player should have some dice in hand, false otherwise

      • setCheck

        public void setCheck(boolean checkIfNotDicePlaced,
                     int checkNumberDiceInWindow)

      • setCheck

        public void setCheck(boolean checkDrawDice,
                     boolean checkSomeDiceInHand,
                     boolean checkFirstRound)
        Parameters:
        checkDrawDice - if i care that the player make this move
        checkSomeDiceInHand - if checkSomeDiceInHand is true the player should have some dice in hand, false otherwise
        checkFirstRound - if false don't care, if true the round shouldn't be the first one

      • setCheck

        public void setCheck(boolean checkDrawDice,
                     boolean checkSomeDiceInHand,
                     boolean checkFirstRound,
                     boolean trueFirstTurnFalseSecond)
        Parameters:
        checkDrawDice - if i care that the player make this move
        checkSomeDiceInHand - if checkSomeDiceInHand is true the player should have some dice in hand, false otherwise
        checkFirstRound - if false don't care, if true the round shouldn't be the first one
        trueFirstTurnFalseSecond - if true check if it's the first Turn; if false check if it's the second one

      • checkUsabilityToolCard

        public void checkUsabilityToolCard(int roundGame,
                                   Player player)
                            throws NoDiceException,
                                   FlowTurnException,
                                   AlreadyPlaceANewDiceException,
                                   AlreadyDrawANewDiceException,
                                   DiceInHandToolException,
                                   FatalGameErrorException
        method for check the usability of the tool card during the game
        Parameters:
        roundGame - he need the current round of the game
        player - he need to check the player state
        Throws:
        GameException - if there is something wrong for using this tool card
        NoDiceException
        FlowTurnException
        AlreadyPlaceANewDiceException
        AlreadyDrawANewDiceException
        DiceInHandToolException
        FatalGameErrorException
